data.description:
Refer a friend and get Pro upgrade for free. Your friend also gets its for free. 

Experience cutting dinks, outrageous rallies and pickup games with AI Bots and friends around the world.
State-of-the-art configurable custom physics, makes VR Pickleball feel like the real thing. Use your real-life forehand, backhand, and volley moves in the game - unlocking more creativity, and a better workout along the way. 
This app includes:
- Configurable AI Bots for Singles and Doubles, Stationary Ball machine, Moving Ball machine, Practice Wall and several drills
-  Pro pack includes Padel, Racquetball, Cricket, Badminton, etc.
- Competitive multiplayer against real players from around the world.
-Several Ball types, Paddle types, Court types and Avatars
- Ambidextrous play
-Customizable physics: Arcade, Simcade and Simulation modes 
-Customizable paddle size, paddle sensitivity, paddle friction, ball bounce, ball friction, etc.
-Support for paddle grip adapters.
-Instant Replay with playback trail
-Instant Analytics
-Configurable options like displaying fault trajectory on the fly, ball landing position, ball trail, collision animation, ball orb, background tracks etc.
- A variety of immersive environments to explore.
-Mixed reality
- In-game leaderboard where you can compete to be a star. 
- Fully localized in following 27 languages with text and audio

Tech support contacts:
Facebook -https://www.facebook.com/groups/vrpickleball/
Discord - https://discord.gg/gHZCUSPuRE
Email - viniotstudios@gmail.com

changelog.change_log: Bugfix footprint court scene which is default for Smash Defense Drill. Freeze ball when it hits the court walls.
Add facial expressions for full body bots
Improve the trajectory display after ball hits the net
Force game end sync in multiplayer. Use unreliable EOS P2P data to send avatar data in multiplayer to reduce bandwidth requirements
Improve ball trajectory display to include the bounces till the fault position
Bugfix menu initialization. Update ball position computation in multiplayer hits.
Bugfix browser showing up by default on start
Add checkbox enable/disable end of game celebration.
Make youtube the default webpage for browser
Bugfix Meta Avatar assets not loading for bot
Update bot hand pose and locomotion
Reduce game load time. Bugfix bot avatar clothes sizing. Update paddle orientation for bot.
Add game end flag to multiplayer score update as a fail safe mechanism in case the multiplayer game scores get out of sync due to connection issues.
Add game end flag to multiplayer score update as a fail safe mechanism in case the multiplayer game scores get out of sync due to connection issues.
Update hand poses for full body avatar

Move dialogs a bit further away from player.
 Rotate popups if needed when player moves so they are facing the player.
 Speed up some bot animations.
 Bugfix bot movement after player serves from wrong position.
Vary Bot Animations based on ball position. Vary accuracy of AI's return based on ball speed.
Add Cargo shorts option for male full body bot
